item.title: Accessing site variables in Hugo render hooks
item.description: To access site variables inside of a Hugo render hook it should be prepended with .Page. For example to access BaseURL instead of {{ .Site.BaseURL }} you shoud use {{ .Page.Site.BaseURL }} https://discourse.gohugo.io/t/render-hook-templates-and-site-variables/33128
